name: The Moneytizer
author: The Moneytizer

sections.description: The Moneytizer is an advertising platform which enables you to monetize your website very easily. Manage your ad units and start displaying the great campaigns. Plus, you can follow your daily statistics on our dashboard.
sections.faq:
Our Frequently Asked Questions page

Our frequently asked questions page is avaible here : https://us.themoneytizer.com/categories-faq

How to sign up for The Moneytizer ?

To be able to use the plugin, you need to have created a Moneytizer account beforehand. To submit your application for free, go to the following page: http://us.themoneytizer.com/

How do I get my site ID ?

You can easily find your website ID. Go to the page: http://us.themoneytizer.com/manager/tag (You need to log in to your Moneytizer dashboard). Or by email if you subscribed directly throught the plugin (V2.0)

sections.reviews:
No sirve para nada

By siguiendolasenda on June 14, 2023

Lo he configurado para que lo instale todo automáticamente, y no hace nada, en un plugin que no sirve para nada, no perdáis tiempo con la instalación. Me tocará configurar todas las acciones manualmente. Una auténtica pérdida de tiempo.

Fácil de usar y eficaz

By Kiyomi (kiyomijf) on February 8, 2023

Facilita la configuración de los anuncios de publicidad y otros elementos del sitio ayudando a generar mejor rendimiento.

Schnell und Effizient

By manosxii on January 18, 2023

Die Integration war sehr einfach mit dem Wordpress Plug In .

Me ayudó con la implementación

By sherezada07 on January 11, 2023

Yo estaba muy interesada en The Moneytizer desde hace meses, pero no me animaba, ya que la integración me parecía medio complicada, luego supe de qué tenían un plugin con WP y me decidí a probarlo. La verdad, el plugin es muy eficaz, hice la integración en algunos minutos y ya estoy monetizando mi sitio. La experiencia ha sido muy buena hasta ahora y sé que va a continuar así. 

Utilisation simple et efficace

By djawao78 on January 4, 2023

Cette extension est très intuitive et m'a permis de monétiser mon site en quelques minutes seulement.

En plus, la rémunération est bien supérieure comparée à plusieurs autres solutions que j'ai pu essayer par le passé.

I've wasted my time!

By Julio Aguilar (Enoc3000) on January 1, 2023

I don't know how I haven't abandoned this platform yet. It's been a week since my website with The moneytizer has stopped generating a penny, and when I check carefully, I realize that the platform could no longer verify my ads.txt

It should be noted that a month ago I started using the moneytizer and "it was working fine", until it stopped working.

I have deleted my previous ads.txt which contained adsense data as well, meaning I downloaded and uploaded the ads.txt generated exclusively by the moneytizer.

I have also uploaded the .php file provided by the moneytizer
I have edited the htaccess including the code that indicates the moneytizer
I have pasted the code provided by the moneytizer in my web header
All this step by step and the answer is always the same: Your file has not been integrated!

I installed the f*k*ng moneytizer plugin (which doesn't work for sh*t) and verified from WordPress and the answer is the same: Your file has not been integrated!
I have pressed the button to automatically integrate the ads.txt directly from the plugin and the answer is the same: Your file has not been integrated!

Everything seems to indicate that I will start 2023 getting rid of this plugin and this platform. Thank you for allowing me to vent, happy new year.

シンプルで使いやすい

By take7649 on December 27, 2022

重くならず、広告も簡単に設置することができました。

Semplice e automatico

By cucina11gio on December 21, 2022

Zero problemi per ora, ho fatto tutto quello che dovevo (ads.txt e formati).

簡単に設定できました！

By nakayama84 (tda560022) on December 21, 2022

マネータイザーのプラグインを利用したら、簡単に広告の設置までできました。パソコン音痴な私にもできましたのでおすすめです。

La mejor herramienta

By susanaecheverryl on December 13, 2022

No tengo muchos conocimientos sobre este tema pero con este plug in fue todo muy facil y rapido. Cualqueira puede utilizarlo, me encanto!

short_description: Monetize your website thanks to advertising. The « all in one » solution to make you earn money thanks to a wide range of ad formats.
